questionTitle: It's ________ time you told him the truth!
The soccer player was ejected because he had done something that was ________ the rules.
Another way of saying 'old-fashioned' is '________ the times'.
You shouldn't pick ________ him just because he's different.
The animal hospital? It's somewhere ________ that big blue building.
Being a nurse is hard work, especially if you're ________ call all the time.
She's the kind of girl who knows everything ________ everyone.
She is, ________ a doubt, the best student in the class.
________ our visit to Japan, we saw a lot of interesting places.
________ the year, I've spoken to her five times.
